short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WAGMIswap.io Wallet Extension. Send & Receive ALGO and Algorand Standard Assets. Sign DApp Transactions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WAGMIswap.io Wallet browser extension lets users approve and sign transactions that are generated by Algorand DApp applications.

Users can send & receive Algo and Algorand Assets. Accounts can be created or imported.  WAGMIswap.io Wallet provides two types of accounts: general accounts and Dapp managed accounts. The intent of WAGMIswap.io Wallet is to simplify the user experience and overcome Algorand blockchain design decisions. Managed accounts allow Dapps on the Algorand blockchain to take action on users behave, when running into Algorand constraints, bringing the user experience more aligned with what they are accustomed to on other blockchain wallets.
